objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor panel with a smooth high-gloss finish in an elegant contrasting dark tone covering the entire booth base; subtle beveled edges for a refined look.
A smooth neutral-colored matte wall panel with precise right angles and minimal seams, providing a clean enclosure at the front of the booth.
A smooth neutral-colored matte wall panel with precise right angles and minimal seams, providing a clean enclosure at the back of the booth.
A smooth neutral-colored matte wall panel with precise right angles and minimal seams, providing a clean enclosure on the left side of the booth.
A smooth neutral-colored matte wall panel with precise right angles and minimal seams, providing a clean enclosure on the right side of the booth.

A sleek modern car model with aerodynamic curves, high-gloss metallic paint finish, stylized LED light clusters, and refined alloy wheels; positioned on a low-profile decorative plinth to highlight its lines.
A stylish pendant light fixture with a slim cylindrical matte-black housing and integrated spotlight lens; emits a focused bright beam to accentuate the exhibit below.

A sleek reception desk of modern minimalist design featuring clean straight lines, a glossy lacquered front panel, integrated LED accent strip, and a slim hidden storage compartment.
A round glass-top table with a slender brushed-metal frame and polished edges, designed for small group discussions.
